sentences.en: A sapling needs pruning, a child discipline.
sentences.cn: 小树要砍, 小孩要管.

sentences.en: Bermuda: Islanders top their tiered wedding cakes with a tiny sapling. The newlyweds plant the tree at their home, where they can watch it grow, as their marriage grows.
sentences.cn: 百慕大：百慕大岛民在他们的多层婚礼蛋糕的顶层插上一株小树苗，新婚夫妇要将这株树苗种在家中，这样他们可以目睹树苗伴随着他们的婚姻一起长大。

sentences.en: Bermuda: Islanders top their tiered wedding cakes with a tiny sapling. The newlyweds plant the tree at their home, where they can watch it grow, as their marriage grows.
sentences.cn: 百慕大：百慕大岛民在他们的多层婚礼蛋的顶层插上一株小树苗，新婚夫妇要将这株树苗种在家中，这样他们可以目睹树苗伴随着他们的婚姻一起长大。

sentences.en: Chop down a small sapling other, a concerted effort to environmental protection, earth has better shape.
sentences.cn: 小小树苗别砍倒, 齐心协力来环保, 地球就会更美好.

sentences.en: It becomes a weak, frail sapling.
sentences.cn: 它变成了一棵虚弱的小树苗。

sentences.en: Like sapling trees, small children are very pliable.
sentences.cn: 就像树苗一样, 小孩子很易塑.

sentences.en: She cut down the sapling with one chop.
sentences.cn: 她一斧子就把树苗砍倒了.

sentences.en: She plucked some leaves off the sapling.
sentences.cn: 她从树苗上摘下一些叶子.

sentences.en: The sapling has grown into a big tree after five years.
sentences.cn: 五年过去了,小树苗长成了一颗大树.

sentences.en: The wind tore at the newly planted sapling.
sentences.cn: 风猛列地撕扯着栽的树苗.

sentences.en: This town guards a holy Elfin relic - a sapling of Brythigga, the World Tree.
sentences.cn: 这座城镇把守着一件精灵圣物 —— 世界之树伯莱世嘉的树苗.
